'''Haeresys''' is an underground arena of the [[Fatui]] which appears in the [[manga]].

This arena is used for experiments where captured test subjects are brought to fight unknown creatures. [[Il Dottore]] and [[Krupp]] performed experiments here on Contender 139 [[Anthony (Manga)|Anthony]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{wt|haeresis|Haeresis}} is a Latin word meaning "sect" or "heresy," derived from the Ancient Greek word {{Lang|mini=1|grc={{wt|αἵρεσις}}|grc_rm=haíresis}}.
